title: Teenage girl shot, IMPD seeking suspects
content:
INDIANAPOLIS (WISH) — The Indianapolis Metropolitan Police Department are on the lookout for suspects after a teenage girl was shot overnight.
Authorities said the shooting occurred just after 1:30 a.m. Sunday morning in the 2700 block of Black Knight Boulevard.
IMPD believes the girl was possibly shot by other teenagers.
The girl is in the hospital in serious but stable condition with a gunshot wound to the thigh.
If you have any information on the shooting, please call Crime Stoppers at 317-262-8477.
